item.title: 澳新银行机构银行部开始裁员
item.description: 随着新上任的首席执行官努诺-马托斯（Nuno Matos）加大改革力度，澳新银行集团控股有限公司（ANZ Group Holdings Ltd.）机构银行部已开始裁员。【原文：ANZ Group Holdings Ltd. has begun to let go people within its institutional banking division as an overhaul by newly-installed Chief Executive Officer Nuno Matos ramps up.】

item.title: 摩根大通聘请对冲基金经理负责中国医疗银行业务
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. has hired hedge fund manager Jane Wu to lead China healthcare investment banking, as the industry emerges from a multi-year rout.】

item.title: 关税之痛迫在眉睫，印度股市投资者趋于安全
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 普京在中国能源领域的胜利打击了特朗普的出口努力
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统上任第一天就发誓要建立美国在全球的能源主导地位。七个月过去了，随着世界上最大的进口国在经济和地缘政治上大展拳脚，这一目标正受到威胁。【原文：On his first day in office, President Donald Trump vowed he would establish US energy dominance over the globe. Seven months on, that goal is under threat as the world’s largest importer flexes its economic and geopolitical muscle.】

item.title: 泰国代理总理寻求解散国会，新一轮竞选白热化
item.description: 泰国看守政府领导人蓬丹-威差猜已着手解散议会，可能为提前举行大选铺平道路，以阻止总理巴东塔恩-西那瓦下台后一个敌对组织组建新政府的努力。【原文：Thailand’s caretaker leader, Phumtham Wechayachai, has moved to dissolve parliament, potentially paving the way for an early general election, an effort to block a bid by a rival group to form a new government after Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra was ousted.】

item.title: 高盛亚洲顶级银行家称中国股市仍有上涨空间
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s top Asia banker sounded an optimistic note on Chinese equities amid resurgent flows and said the firm is hiring in Hong Kong and India.】

item.title: 诺沃格拉茨说：人工智能代理将成为稳定币的最大用户
item.description: 银河数字公司（Galaxy Digital）创始人兼首席执行官迈克尔-诺沃格拉茨（Michael Novogratz）认为，人工智能工具将促进稳定币的使用，因为这两项技术的结合越来越紧密。【原文：Artificial intelligence tools will boost stablecoin usage as the two technologies become more closely intertwined, according to Michael Novogratz, founder and chief executive officer of Galaxy Digital.】

item.title: 日本长期债券加入全球下跌行列，政治因素加剧紧张情绪
item.description: 在全球债券抛售和日本政治不确定性的影响下，日本较长期限的债务下滑，收益率走高。【原文：Japan’s longer-maturity debt slumped, sending yields higher, following a global selloff in bonds and political uncertainty in the nation.】

item.title: 从石油到煤炭的转变让中国化工企业收获颇丰
item.description: 煤炭价格下跌正在改变中国化工行业的盈利能力，从传统的石油生产商转向越来越多的以固体燃料为原料的工厂。【原文：Falling coal prices are shifting the profitability of China’s chemicals sector, away from traditional oil-based producers to the growing number of plants that use the solid fuel as their feedstock.】

item.title: 民间调查显示中国服务业扩张速度为一年来最快
item.description: 一项民间调查显示，由于暑期旅游旺季在国内消费相对疲软的时期为需求提供了动力，8 月份中国服务业活动以一年多来最快的速度增长。【原文：China’s services activity expanded at the fastest pace in over a year in August, a private survey showed, as the summer travel season powered demand during what has otherwise been a relatively weak stretch for domestic consumption.】

item.title: 900 亿美元债券销售狂潮过后，信贷市场接近创纪录水平
item.description: 本周二，全球借款人出售了至少 900 亿美元的投资级债务，全球部分信贷市场在今年最繁忙的一周里接近或打破了历史记录。【原文：Borrowers across the globe sold at least $90 billion in investment-grade debt on Tuesday, as parts of global credit markets neared or toppled records in one of the busiest weeks this year.】

item.title: 伦敦金属交易所将交易开始时间推迟 90 分钟
item.description: 伦敦金属交易所周三将亚洲交易的开始时间推迟了 90 分钟，其电子平台于北京时间上午 9:30 而不是通常的上午 8 点开始交易。【原文：The London Metal Exchange delayed the start of trading in Asia by 90 minutes on Wednesday, with its electronic platform opening at 9:30 a.m. Beijing time instead of the usual 8 a.m.】

item.title: 澳大利亚经济在家庭支出的推动下加速增长
item.description: 由于宽松的货币政策支撑了经济活动，澳大利亚第二季度的经济增长在家庭消费的带动下加速。【原文：Australia’s economic growth accelerated in the second quarter led by household consumption as easier monetary policy underpinned activity.】

item.title: 泰森食品公司任命科尔为首席运营官，预示领导层将进一步变动
item.description: 美国肉类巨头泰森食品公司（Tyson Foods Inc.【原文：Tyson Foods Inc. has appointed the head of its poultry business as chief operating officer, with the US meat giant signaling more management changes associated with its succession planning.】

item.title: 受低收益率困扰的中国债券可能继续输给股票
item.description: 由于收益率较低，中国投资者越来越多地放弃本地债券，转而投资股票，分析人士认为短期内出现逆转的可能性很小。【原文：Chinese investors are increasingly forsaking local bonds in favor of stocks given the low yields on offer, and analysts see little chance of a near-term reversal.】

item.title: 股票交易者驾驭中国阅兵式指南
item.description: 周三，中国在北京举行阅兵式，中国战斗机制造商、机器人公司和其他国防相关企业的股票成为焦点。【原文：Shares of Chinese fighter-jet makers, robotics companies and other defense-related firms are in the spotlight as the nation holds a military parade in Beijing on Wednesday.】

item.title: 摩根大通将加强在印度的企业银行业务，促进投资跃升
item.description: 摩根大通公司正在加强其在印度的企业银行业务，重点关注电动汽车、数据中心和太阳能等行业，因为这些行业的企业正在全球增长最快的主要经济体增加资本支出。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is strengthening its corporate banking presence in India, focusing on sectors such as electric vehicles, data centers, and solar energy, as firms in these industries ramp up capital spending in the world’s fastest-growing major economy.】

item.title: 受降息押注和债务担忧影响，黄金在飙升至创纪录水平后保持坚挺
item.description: 由于美国降息的前景提升了黄金的吸引力，而且交易者在股市和债市大跌后寻求安全，黄金在周二保持了连续六天的涨势，并将价格推高至历史新高。【原文：Gold held a six-day rally that pushed prices to an all-time high on Tuesday, as the prospect of US interest-rate cuts boosted the metal’s appeal and traders sought safety following a selloff in equity and bond markets.】

item.title: 交易商权衡地缘政治风险和欧佩克+政策，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 在欧佩克+（OPEC+）供应会议召开之前，投资者权衡了一系列地缘政治风险，包括美国对俄罗斯的制裁可能升级。【原文：Oil steadied after closing at the highest in a month as investors weighed a host of geopolitical risks, including a potential escalation of US sanctions on Russian flows, in the run-up to an OPEC+ meeting on supply.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会和商品期货交易委员会工作人员提供登记现货加密资产交易的途径
item.description: 华尔街的两位最高监管者告诉联邦注册交易所的运营商，他们已准备好帮助美国市场进一步向数字资产开放，上市某些现货加密产品并不在禁止之列。【原文：Signaling their readiness to help further open US markets to digital assets, two of Wall Street’s top regulators told operators of federally registered exchanges that listing certain spot crypto products isn’t prohibited.】

item.title: 石破茂的重要盟友计划退出，日本股市开盘将走低
item.description: 日本首相石破茂的主要权力掮客宣布有意辞职后，石破茂的地位受到质疑，日元走软，日本股票期货下跌，表明东京股市开盘低迷。【原文：Japan’s stock futures fell, pointing to a muted open in Tokyo, after Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba’s key power broker announced his intention to resign, casting doubt over Ishiba’s position and weakening the yen.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司债权人提交拯救该公司的修订计划
item.description: 泰晤士水务公司的一个高级债权人小组已向英国监管机构提交了一份新的运营计划，作为拯救和接管这家濒临破产的公用事业公司的努力的一部分。【原文：A group of Thames Water’s senior creditors has submitted a new operational plan to the UK regulator as part of its bid to rescue and take over the ailing utility.】

item.title: 游说团体称英国面临北海油气承包商外流风险
item.description: 一个游说团体警告说，英国的石油和天然气生产商已经饱受高税收和产量下降之苦，现在还面临着设备和服务供应商撤出业务的紧迫风险。【原文：UK oil and gas producers — already suffering from high taxes and waning output — now also face the imminent risk of being hit by a pullback in operations by equipment and services suppliers, a lobby group warned.】

item.title: 中国富人重拾高风险 "滚雪球 "式衍生品获取收益
item.description: 在监管机构限制 "滚雪球 "衍生产品一年之后，中国富人再次将资金投入到 "滚雪球 "衍生产品中，以获取更丰厚的回报。【原文：China’s wealthy are once again pouring money into “snowball” derivatives for juicier returns, a year after the regulator curbed the product that was blamed for exacerbating a stock rout.】

item.title: 亚洲股市有望追随华尔街跌势：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市将延续美国股市的疲软态势，美国股市在公司债券抛售潮和发达国家预算忧虑的影响下与债券齐跌。【原文：Asian stocks are poised to mirror a weak US session, where equities fell alongside bonds amid a rush of corporate-debt sales and worries over developed-world budgets.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司能够抵御贸易战，并将印度视为重要市场
item.description: 巴西国家石油公司首席执行官玛格达-尚布里亚（Magda Chambriard）说，由于对包括印度在内的其他国家的销售强劲，巴西国家石油公司在抵御美国贸易战方面处于有利地位。【原文：Petrobras is in a favorable position to withstand the US trade war thanks to robust sales to other countries including India, Chief Executive Officer Magda Chambriard said.】

item.title: 卡夫亨氏分拆计划引发穆迪降级审查
item.description: 卡夫亨氏公司（Kraft Heinz Co.）的投资级信用评级正在接受穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）的审查，评级可能下调，因为该公司的业务分拆计划引发了对其未来资本结构的不确定性。【原文：Kraft Heinz Co.’s investment-grade credit rating is being reviewed for a potential downgrade by Moody’s Ratings after the company’s plan to split its business raised uncertainties over its future capital structure.】

item.title: 谨慎的美元头寸仍在为新南威尔士州 T 公司带来红利
item.description: 新南威尔士财政公司（New South Wales Treasury Corp.【原文：New South Wales Treasury Corp.’s move to slash dollar exposure has delivered gains, and the state-owned issuer is positioning for further greenback weakness.】

item.title: 苹果公司因美国裁决而获益，与谷歌的搜索交易得以保全
item.description: 苹果公司股价在尾盘交易中上涨，原因是美国一名法官没有禁止苹果公司与谷歌达成利润丰厚的搜索协议，这项协议每年为这家 iPhone 制造商带来约 200 亿美元的收入。【原文：Apple Inc. shares gained in late trading after a US judge stopped short of barring its lucrative search arrangement with Google, a deal that has generated roughly $20 billion in revenue a year for the iPhone maker.】

item.title: Jane Street、Citadel Securities 凭借交易大单巩固领先地位
item.description: 美国最大做市商公司的一系列业绩为华尔街利润丰厚的交易业务如何迅速重塑树立了新的标杆。【原文：A slew of results from America’s largest market-making firms staked a new marker in how quickly Wall Street’s lucrative trading business is being reshaped.】
